trans-unit.source: Represents a day on a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um dia em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the date is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a data está indisponível.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the date unavailable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a data não está disponível; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsBlackedOut*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsBlackedOut*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsBlackedOut*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this button is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este botão é realçado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the button is highlighted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o botão é realçado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsHighlighted*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsHighlighted*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsHighlighted*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this button represents a day that is not in the currently displayed month.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este botão representa um dia que não está no mês exibido no momento.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> of a calendar is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, it might display days that are not in that month.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>de calendário é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, ele pode exibir dias que não estão no mês.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a calendar that shows March 2009 also displays the days February 22 through February 28 and April 1 through April 4.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um calendário que mostra março de 2009 também exibe os dias 22 de fevereiro por meio de 28 de fevereiro e 1 de abril a 4 de abril.

trans-unit.source: Because those dates are not in the month of March, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton.IsInactive%2A> property is set to `true` for the buttons that represent those days.
trans-unit.target: Como não são as datas no mês de março, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton.IsInactive%2A>está definida como `true` para os botões que representam os dias.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton.IsInactive%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the button represents a day that is not in the currently displayed month; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o botão representa um dia que não está no mês exibido no momento; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsInactive*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsInactive*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsInactive*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the date is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a data está selecionada. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the date is the current date; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a data é a data atual; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
